author: RTÉ News
title: US records world's highest Covid-19 death toll
description: The United States surpassed has Italy as the country with the highest reported coronavirus death toll, recording more than 20,000 deaths since the outbreak began, according to a Reuters tally.
content:
The United States surpassed has Italy as the country with the highest reported coronavirus death toll, recording more than 20,000 deaths since the outbreak began, according to a Reuters tally.
